title: Maya Jama plays Stormzy track at Bacardi bash as she bops along
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Just because Maya Jama and Stormzy aren’t dating anymore doesn’t mean she can’t have a good bop to his songs, right?

The presenter was spotted showing off her DJ skills at Bacardi’s recent event, as she played one of the rapper’s tracks.

Clearly having a blast, she can be seen dancing along as she concentrated on the decks.

The star looked to be having the time of her life at the party as she filmed herself dancing on her Instagram Stories, and posed away with her headphones on and rocking a cropped pink jumper.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Maya played a set at the event to celebrate the launch of Bacardi’s new rum, playing tracks inspired by the drink’s Caribbean heritage.

She and Stormzy had fans shocked when they split back in August, with the rapper being accused of cheating with Jorja Smith. He denied all claims.

Maya looked to be having a blast (Picture: PA)

Since, the 25-year-old has opened up about how she’s ‘having fun’ being single.

Speaking to ES Magazine about dating again, Maya said: ‘No! I’m scared to date. I haven’t been single in so long, how the f**k do you flirt anymore?! I’ve been basically with my friends 24/7.’

She continued: ‘I forgot how much I loved just literally being in a house with loads of my friends, eating, talking, drinking.

Maya and Stormzy split in August (Picture: WireImage)

‘I was like, I miss this a little bit. I’m having fun.’

Meanwhile, fans have been hoping for a spark between the star and footballer Jamie Redknapp after they’ve been spotted hanging out.

The pair posed away at Oktoberfest alongside Freddie Flintoff as they took on the boozy festival.

Maya appeared to be a guest on The Last Keg, however her upcoming role isn’t clear just yet – all we know is it involved travelling…and beer.

Advertisement

Advertisement

All in all, it didn’t seem like a bad day out at all.

description: Maya Jama plays one of ex-boyfriend Stormzy's tracks at Bacardi bash as she dances along after split.
